description: Try our easy to follow Leftover Bbq Lamb Fajitas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fajita,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Peanut free
name: Leftover Bbq Lamb Fajitas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chops. Cut into thin strips about 2cm long. Heat olive oil in a heavy-based frying pan over medium heat. Add spices and meat and stir for 2 minutes. Add cup water, a pinch of salt and mix well. Cook, stirring often, for about 5 minutes or until meat is heated through. Remove from the pan and set aside on a plate.

Add onion and capsicum to the same pan and cook for 7 minutes or until slightly browned. Return the meat to the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, for a further 3 minutes. Serve immediately with soft tortilla bread, grated cheese, sliced tomato and shredded lettuce.
